verses:
Unto the end, a psalm for David, to bring to remembrance that the
Lord saved him.
O God, come to my assistance; O Lord, make haste to help me.
Let them be confounded and ashamed that seek my soul:

Let them be turned backward, and blush for shame that desire
evils to me:  Let them be presently turned away blushing for shame that
say to me:  'Tis well, 'tis well.

Let all that seek thee rejoice and be glad in thee; and let such
as love thy salvation say always:  The Lord be magnified.

But I am needy and poor; O God, help me.  Thou art my helper and
my deliverer:  O lord, make no delay.
